comments.body: How about instead there would be a piglin mob head similar to the wither, creeper, zombie and skeleton heads. You'd get it the same way as the later 3, by making a charged creeper blow up a piglin. Then just as a small detail with it, if you wear it the piglins will be neutral and trade with you like how if you wear gold armor.
That’s a very cool idea!
That would make it no challenge.
I like the thought. If ancient debris spawned more at the low-level area where it is difficult to access, and sparsely at the high-level area to equate the difficulty between the two locations.
Already works that way but rarer. Two veins are generated in the chunk between y=22 and y=6 and a chance for a third vein at any y level
if this is what you are saying it would be great four us to have magma to pull you down, soul sand to push you up and soul soil to just provide you with air!
Really cool idea!

Sounds like a decent reward for raids. If you were to want to use it, would you need to right-click the villager with it?

You know how real credit cards work right...? You aren’t just getting free stuff you need to pay it back when it’s due

I think things should be more expensive, but the idea of obtaining a $20 Emerald gift card would be awesome for the expensive items. Then, it's like reality more.

ive been wanting all different wood varieties of chests for a long long time, this now includes crimson n warped

only because its hot doesnt mean its poisoned
Call it scalded milk for the detail oriented. Add a new nether item that can be added to milk to keep it from being scalded. Or a new nether item that removes effects. Like it, but could be annoying.
No, if you leave it in a non-redstone activated so it expires after one day and you get fresh milk from cows.
Yaay! I do a cat roleplay on minecraft, and ive been wanting more variants of yellow flowers.
YES! I'd love my birth flower to be added to the game, though it'd make no sense for it be that big. Maybe daffodil clumps, but not the flower itself.
Yeah, but maybe able to put them in pots tbh, also should come with different variants of colours and such of them too tbh

If francium is added, uranium and plutonium may be added. Perhaps these minerals are incredibly valuable fuel sources (150+ blocks smelted), but need to be mined with lead, and are very rare. These ores then must be smelted into condensed versions. Radiation may be a status effect that can effect air around these blocks when these blocks are placed. Uranium and plutonium could be used for 'super TNT' that blow up double, and then triple the amount of normal TNT.

Us science minds definitely need more things like this. We need more machines, power sources, automation, equipment, and the ability to mess around in labs. Biology, Radiology, (xenobiology for nether and end if they can make it seem more alien), etc... Love the idea.
You might want to change the name. The current one made me think of a heaven dimension plant, rather than a nether one. Cool idea, though!
Seria bom ter a possibilidade de conseguir pegar com uma tesoura, e dar algumas frutas que só estariam printar pra comer depois de serem cozidas, uma ótima idéia
Leonardo Plaster, I think that is a good idea, but it would be too similar to the campfire. Perhaps the campfire could have a new recipe where you replace the coal with the burning bush.

thats a nice idea , tho i'm not sure whether or not it would be that good...

Maybe they can only use leather horse armor? The reason they currently can’t wear armor is because they can wear chests. The point is you have to choose between inventory and protection. Limiting donkeys to leather would keep this imbalance.
It should work for Myzelium and Podzol as well
Combined with some number of snowballs, a snowy lawn variant may be craftable and finally make use of the snow grass texture

To clarify, when you say "Tiny Tree" do you mean "fern?" Because I like the idea of more ferns. I'll add Lily of the Valley where it grows. I can never get it to sprout with bonemeal.

When I say "tiny tree" I mean the jungle bushes which are basically one-block-high oak trees. Leafy bushes.

I mean, ferns should grow with bonemeal too in the relevant biomes, but kind of assumed that was already true.
This is a cool idea, can't wait for the nether update (1.16). Can't wait to half sword those mobs (half sword is a battle tactic, search it up)

Thanks for your contribution.
I wrote something like this hoping to bring Mojang's attention to this

This sounded like a joke suggestion at first, but it's still really fitting for Minecraft, despite how weird it is. Minecraft is a weird game after all- you can ride pigs, there's mushroom islands, and much more.

I will say, though, that night vision already greatly improves underwater vision, and honey (arriving in 1.15) removes poison. The part about the armor puffing up is already a thing with thorns as well.
Yeah but it's like a free thorns so you don't need to enchant it. Also it does Poison damage

I think this is a realy good idea, but instead of it being crafted with whole pufferfish they instead should drop somthing else and use that to craft. This should be super weak but good enough for early game. Another idea when you have a full set of it drowned wont want to attack you because pufferfish posin does alot of damage to them? Just a thought.

Alternatively you should add a pufferfish to iron armor (like netherite to diamond). It’d give you better protection and durability than your original idea, but you need to crouch and like thorns, you have to be hit for it to work. Unlike thorns, if those conditions are met, it works 100% of the time.

Maybe not the helmet thing, but the potion idea is great! Also, Shulkers should always drop 2 Shulker Shells.

Additionally, a Shulker Brain could be crafted with two Shulker Shells to make a placeable “Shulker Pet”! When sitting (like a tamed wolf), it would appear in the partially open position, and would not attack players. When not “sitting”, it would attack any nearby players other than the one who placed it. It would have visible differences from a normal Shulker, and it would be dyeable like a wolf’s collar, except dyeing it would change the color of the entire shell. If killed, it would always drop its brain and both shells. If named, the brain it drops would have the same name. If a named brain is used to craft, the crafted “Shulker Pet” item would have the same name. If a named “Shulker Pet” is placed, the spawned “Shulker Pet” would have the same name. A “Shulker Pet’s” levitation effect wouldn’t last as long as a normal Shulker’s.

I suggest that you update your current post to include this idea, as I don’t want this idea to go to waste! If you do not update your original post within a month of me leaving this comment, I will probably just post the Shulker Pet thing myself, Shulker brain included.

That is a very good idea, I am rethinking the shulker helmet and I think I will take it out.  And you should make a post about the shulker pet, I don't mind if you use the shulker brain idea, you could even link this post to your post.
Or instead of Netherack it could become a new block. The magma clast

English translation(post not title)

A milk bubble will act just like a milk bucket, but the time until the effects are over will be divided into two. An explosive and foggy milk potion will be needed to protect your animals and pets from the negative effects imposed by hostile mobs.

Traducción al español (post no título)

Una burbuja de leche actuará como un cubo de leche, pero el tiempo hasta que los efectos terminen se dividirá en dos. Se necesitará una poción de leche explosiva y con niebla para proteger a sus animales y mascotas de los efectos negativos impuestos por las turbas hostiles.
Thanks for the translation, WeptSkydiver666
